name: Voodoo Island
overview: Here on Voodoo Island the player's task is to destroy the evil plot Dr. Beauvais is preparing. Voodoo Island's text parser is similar to that of another Angelsoft game, Forbidden Castle, but unlike other games by that company, the puzzles here do not need to be solved in a limited number of turns, giving players all the time in the world to explore the island they're on.
